title: Business Impact of COVID-19 Survey (BICS)
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: The indicators and analysis presented in this bulletin are based on responses from the new voluntary fortnightly business survey, which captures businesses responses on how their turnover, workforce prices, trade and business resilience have been affected in the two week reference period.
sizingNotes: Multiple tabs with simple table structures and multiple dimensions. Some footnotes.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to heading "Latest version" , dataset link is green button under this heading.
